explains: n. [环境][炉窑] 焚化炉，焚尸炉；焚烧装置

sentences.en: A refuse incinerator commissioned in 1993 used to contribute heat to help run the desalination system.
sentences.cn: 1993年投入使用的垃圾焚烧炉用于产生热量，以帮助运行脱盐系统。

sentences.en: Then a giant incinerator in space would burn the garbage.
sentences.cn: 太空中的那个巨大的焚化炉就会把它们都烧掉。

sentences.en: That leaf was almost certainly torn up and sent to the incinerator .
sentences.cn: 几乎可以肯定这一页后来被撕下来送进了焚化炉。
